# React + Flask Full Stack Project Setup

## Project Structure
- `frontend/` - React application with SnapFolio template
- `backend/` - Flask API server

## Setup Progress
- [x] Project instructions file created
- [x] React frontend setup
- [x] Flask backend setup
- [x] CORS and API configuration
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] SnapFolio template integrated
- [x] All components converted to React
- [x] Documentation complete

## Summary
Complete full-stack application with React frontend using the SnapFolio portfolio template and Flask backend. All dependencies installed, CORS configured, template fully integrated with proper JSX formatting, and ready to run.

## Template Integration
- ✅ All HTML converted to JSX (class → className, proper closing tags)
- ✅ 9 React components created (Header, Hero, About, Stats, Skills, Resume, Portfolio, Services, Contact, Footer)
- ✅ All CSS, images, and vendor libraries copied to public/assets
- ✅ Vendor scripts dynamically loaded (Bootstrap, AOS, Typed.js, GLightbox, Isotope, Swiper)
- ✅ All animations and features working
- ✅ Responsive design maintained

## Running the Application
Both servers are currently running:
- React frontend: http://localhost:3000
- Flask backend: http://localhost:5000
